name: drop stitch scarf
notes:
this scarf uses a horizontal drop stitch or seafoam pattern. it is fun and easy to make, and looks beautiful in a variegated yarn. it is well suited to yarns that are a little slippery or silky.

after wearing, my scarf (made with 273 yards of handmaiden lady godiva) is about 70 inches/178cm long, and 5 inches/13 cm wide along the length with the garter stitch ends about 7 inches/18 cm wide.

it was quite a bit shorter and wider right off the needles, before it had a chance to drape. this stitch pattern will definitely open up and grow in length once you block your scarf and put it on.

* sami kaplan has designed the [drop stitch hat with button-on earflaps][2] to match this scarf!  
* jessica kropf has designed a lovely [drop stitch tam][3] to match as well.

this pattern has been graciously translated into the following languages:

* [italian][4] by isabel
* [french][5], by sophie l.
* norwegian, by maj is no longer available
* [german][6], by angela
* [spanish][7], by tanya
* [finnish][8], by salla
* [dutch][9], by katia is only for invited guests of the blog


  [2]: http://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/drop-stitch-hat-with-button-on-ear-flaps
  [3]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/drop-stitch-tam
  [4]: https://christine.typepad.com/free_patterns/easy%20drop%20stitch%20scarf%20ita.pdf
  [5]: https://christine.typepad.com/free_patterns/easy%20drop%20stitch%20scarf%20pattern%20%28fr%29.pdf
  [6]: http://anleitungen.bestrickendes.de/2012/07/03/wellenmusterschal/
  [7]: http://alfanhui14.wordpress.com/2009/10/13/traduccion-de-drop-stitch-scarf-pattern/
  [8]: https://christine.typepad.com/free_patterns/helppo%20huiviohje%20langankiertoja%20pudottamalla.pdf
  [9]: http://tucanasdream.blogspot.com/2010/10/drop-stitch-scarf-nederlandse-vertaling.html
